alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 1:37PM EDT until August 21 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON AND SOUTHWESTERN LYCOMING COUNTIES... At 136 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mill Hall, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, McElhattan, Mackeyville, Waterville, Beech Creek and Lock Haven University. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Lock Haven and Loganton exits, specifically from mile markers 179 to 180. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
